Literature.Title: NOVEL ANTI-MICROBIAL PEPTIDOMIMETIC COMPOUNDS AND METHODS TO CALCULATE ANTI-MICROBIAL ACTIVITY
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Venugopal D, Bhonsle JB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=10µM),Plasmodium falciparum W2(IC50=5.7µg/ml),Plasmodium falciparum D6(IC50=7.3µg/ml)
